mapper.insert: insert into tattle values( tt_seq.nextval, #{victimId}, #{attackerId}, #{ttCategory}, #{ttContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select fs_no as fsNo, fs_writer as fsWriter, fs_title as fsTitle, fs_content as fsContent, fs_category as fsCategory, fs_price as fsPrice, fs_working as fsWorking, fs_child_category as fsChildCategory, fs_photo as fsPhoto from fservice where fs_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or fs_child_category like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or fs_writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
